description: Jenkins is well known in the development world as a build, CI, CD/CD server, but what about operations? In addition to the use cases you would expect from infrastructure as code, server admins often have to deal with legacy products existing within silos of responsibility in order to cobble together architecture. Let’s chat about how Jenkins can be used to delegate functionality, perform CD of your infrastructure and act as a central workflow hub for operations.
title: Jenkins for Smarter Operations
